Title: Sins of the Sister
Description:
This druid is trying to convince Malfurion not to let me bury my sister here with the rest of my family. He won't even let me get a word in.
 
<Kelestra tightly clutches the straps of her backpack holding her sister's remains.>
 
I know I have asked a lot of you already. Could you talk to them? Perhaps they might listen to you?
ObjectivesText: Speak with Malfurion Stormrage about Koroleth's remains.
